dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Silence, intruder! What business have you in these shadows?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge of the darkness that envelops this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Hah! Mortal minds cannot fathom the depths of our realm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to challenge your dominion, only to understand it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is a luxury you can ill afford. Leave before you provoke the ire of the shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your power and will depart in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. Leave now and disturb this realm no more.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be intimidated. Prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal! Your defiance seals your fate. Prepare for oblivion!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows hold secrets that I must uncover, I cannot leave empty-handed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Secrets are kept for a reason, and mortals are not meant to unravel them.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will respect the secrecy of the shadows and depart peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A rare display of prudence. Begone from this place, and trouble us no more.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be deterred. I will uncover the darkness, even at the cost of conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool! Your persistence will be your downfall. Prepare for a reckoning!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to ally with the shadows, to understand and coexist in harmony.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ally with shadows? An amusing notion, but one that holds no place in our realm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your skepticism. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An unexpected display of insight. Leave now, and perhaps the shadows will forget your intrusion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not give up on finding common ground. I will prove the worth of our alliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Deluded mortal! Your naivety will be your downfall. Prepare for the wrath of the shadows!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge the darkness that shrouds this realm and bring light to dispel its shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Lightbearer, arrogant and naive. Your presence here is an insult to the shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not seek conflict, but balance. Let us find a way to coexist peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance? There is no balance in the realm of shadows. Your ideals are futile.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will heed your warning and depart, seeking balance elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A moment of clarity from a lightbearer. Leave now, and trouble us no more.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. I will bring light to dispel the shadows, no matter the cost.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool! Your light will be extinguished in the darkness. Prepare for your end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The darkness may be powerful, but it cannot withstand the radiance of true light. I challenge you!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish lightbearer! Your arrogance blinds you to the power of the shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not seek blind confrontation. Let us find a way to understand each other's strengths.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding between light and shadow? A hopeless endeavor, but I will indulge your foolishness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you will not yield to reason, then prepare to face the consequences. I will bring light to this darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words are as empty as your light. Prepare to be swallowed by the shadows' embrace!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a chance for unity, where light and shadows can coexist in harmony. Will you accept?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity? An alien concept to the shadows, and one that will always elude you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see the futility of my offer. I will depart in peace, leaving the shadows undisturbed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A rare display of wisdom from a lightbringer. Leave now, and trouble us no more.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you reject unity, then I have no choice but to bring the light that will reveal the truth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your light will be snuffed out before it has a chance to illuminate our shadows. Prepare for annihilation!
